examples.example: 他轻轻地捏起一撮茶叶放入茶壶中。

translate.english: He gently pinched up a pinch of tea leaves and put them into the teapot.

examples.example: 她微笑着拿起一撮彩色的糖果递给小朋友。

translate.english: She smiled and picked up a pinch of colorful candies and handed them to the children.

examples.example: 他从罐子里拿出一撮盐放入了汤中，让汤的味道更加鲜美了。

translate.english: He took out a pinch of salt from the jar and put it into the soup, making the taste of the soup more delicious.
